CustomField.formula:
CASE(SBQQ__ProductName__c , 'Change Order: Installation','18', 'Change Order: Transportation','19', 'Change Order: Return Transportation','128', 'Change Order: Dismantle','127', 'Return Transportation','121', 'Dismantle','122', IF(Required_By_Product__c = 'Change Order: VAPS','17', IF(OR(SBQQ__RequiredBy__r.Trans_Category__c='Installation', SBQQ__RequiredBy__r.Trans_Category__c='Delivery', SBQQ__RequiredBy__r.Trans_Category__c='VAPS', AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Unit__c)),SBQQ__RequiredBy__r.Trans_Category__c='Sale')),SBQQ__RequiredBy__r.Fee_Type_ID__c,'' ) )
)
CustomField.label: NS Fee Type ID
